AC.name: Access Control
AC.description: Access control policies and procedures to limit system access to authorized users.

AT.name: Awareness and Training
AT.description: Security awareness and training to ensure personnel understand security responsibilities.

AU.name: Audit and Accountability
AU.description: Audit and accountability policies to ensure user actions can be traced.

CA.name: Security Assessment
CA.description: Security assessment and authorization activities to evaluate security controls.

CM.name: Configuration Management
CM.description: Configuration management policies to establish and maintain baseline configurations.

CP.name: Contingency Planning
CP.description: Contingency planning for backup and disaster recovery operations.

IA.name: Identification and Authentication
IA.description: Identification and authentication policies to verify user identities.

IR.name: Incident Response
IR.description: Incident response capability to detect and respond to security incidents.

MP.name: Media Protection
MP.description: Media protection policies to protect system media.

PE.name: Physical Protection
PE.description: Physical protection policies to protect facilities and equipment.

PS.name: Personnel Security
PS.description: Personnel security policies to ensure trustworthy workforce.

RA.name: Risk Assessment
RA.description: Risk assessment policies to identify and assess risks.

SA.name: System and Services Acquisition
SA.description: System and services acquisition policies and procedures.

SR.name: Supply Chain Risk Management
SR.description: Supply chain risk management policies and procedures.

Critical.description: Controls that are essential for protecting CUI and must be implemented immediately

High.description: Controls that significantly reduce risk and should be prioritized

Medium.description: Controls that provide important security functions

Low.description: Controls that support overall security posture
